content.question: The line tangent to the graph of the twice-differentiable function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at the point <math alttext="x equals 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is used to approximate the value of <math alttext="f of 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements guarantees that the tangent line approximation at <math alttext="x equals 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is an underestimate of <math alttext="f of 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo>(</mo><mn>3.25</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="3 is less than or equal to x, which is less than or equal to 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is increasing on the interval <math alttext="3 is less than or equal to x, which is less than or equal to 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The graph of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is concave down on the interval <math alttext="3 is less than or equal to x, which is less than or equal to 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The graph of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is concave up on the interval <math alttext="3 is less than or equal to x, which is less than or equal to 3.25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3.25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
